availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Sullivan (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Fillisana Sullivan. Father of Lafayette Sullivan and Eda E. Sullivan. Married to Melinda Sullivan. Laborer in Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 294B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Tharps, p. 682.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 3, p. 423A.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Ballard County Administrators Bonds, 1880-1827, p. 467.
